snippet: Nick Zoricic, 29, tumbled through the safety nets lining the side of the course as his skis and poles were thrown clear.
abstract: Winter Sports Roundup; Canadian ski racer Nick Zoricic dies after crashing on the course in a World Cup ski cross event in Grindelwald, Switzerland; Zoricic tumbled through safety nets in what ski authorities called a 'freak accident'; other winter sports items noted.
lead_paragraph: Nick Zoricic, 29, tumbled through the safety nets lining the side of the course as his skis and poles were thrown clear.

headline.seo: Nick Zoricic, Canadian Ski Cross Racer, Dies After Crash
headline.main: Canadian Ski Cross Racer Dies After Crash on Course
headline.print_headline: Canadian Ski Cross Racer Dies After Crash on Course
